metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32531 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The Apache Bookkeeper Java Client (before 4.14.6 and also 4.15.0) does notclose the connection to the bookkeeper server when TLS hostnameverification fails. This leaves the bookkeeper client vulnerable to a manin the middle attack. The problem affects BookKeeper client prior toversions 4.14.6 and 4.15.1.

criterions.comment: bookkeeper package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
